isis.stitle: TSI 06-12-11 - 2006 Model Year Changes for VT 275 Diesel Engines

subjectgroup.subject: 2006 Model Year Changes for VT 275 Diesel Engines

caution.para: To prevent possible engine damage, do not use 2006 model year parts on 2005 model year or older engines.

svcproc.title: Cylinder Head
svcproc.para: Identification of the cylinder head and associated changes:

item.para: Cylinder head gasket with larger dowel sleeve holes
Larger 20 mm (0.79 in) cylinder head locating dowel sleeve holes
Injector clamp bolt hole relocation, see item 2, Figure 1
Carrier bolt hole size and location changes, see item 1, Figure 1
32 mm (1.26 in) cup (freeze) plugs, instead of 28 mm (1.10 in) cup plugs, see item 3, Figure 1

figure.caption: Figure 1. 2006 cylinder head assembly with valves (1850345C91)

calloutgroup.callout1: Carrier bolt hole size increased and relocated M10 x 1.5 (2)

svcproc.title: Crankcase
svcproc.para: Crankcase dowel sleeve holes were made larger, see Figure 2

figure.caption: Figure 2. 2006 crankcase (1847862C2) with larger 20 mm (0.79 in) dowel sleeve holes

svcproc.title: Rocker Arm Carrier Assembly
svcproc.para: Identification of rocker arm carrier assembly changes:

item.para: Carrier outside wall was modified to provide clearance for injector hold down clamp, see item 2, Figure 3
Two M10 x 50 bolts replace the M8 x 50 bolts, see item 1, Figure 3

calloutgroup.callout1: Increased injector hold down clamp clearance

svcproc.title: Oil Level Gauge Tube Assembly
svcproc.para: Identification of oil level gauge tube assembly changes:

item.para: Taller oil level gauge tube assembly boss, see Figure 4
Oil level gauge tube assembly secured with a single bolt

figure.caption: Figure 4. Rocker arm carrier assembly oil level gauge tube assembly boss height increased

calloutgroup.callout1: 2006 rocker arm carrier assembly with increased oil level gauge tube assembly boss height to 41.75 mm (1.64 in)
2005 rocker arm carrier assembly with original oil level gauge tube assembly boss height to 39 mm (1.54 in)

svcproc.title: Injector Hold Down Clamp Assembly

caution.para: To prevent possible engine damage, do not mix 2006 model year parts with 2005 model year or older parts. New 2006 injector hold down clamps may fit and appear to work on 2005 heads but will fail prematurely. Old 2005 injector hold down clamps may fit and appear to work on new 2006 heads but will fail prematurely.

svcproc.para: Identification of injector hold down clamp assembly changes:

item.para: Changes have been made to the tail end of the injector clamps to avoid interference with the outboard carrier wall in the inner side of the rocker arm carrier assembly.
Increase the bolt head size from T40 to T45.
Increase the bolt torque from 33 N·m (24 lbf·ft) to 35 N·m (26 lbf·ft).

figure.caption: Figure 5. 2006 injector hold down clamp assembly (1856236C1)

calloutgroup.callout1: Tail end of injector clamp changed to avoid interference
